description:
Hello guys and gals, it's me Mutahar again! This time we take a look at what appears to be Denuvo, the scourge of PC gaming trying to make amends with a community that all but despises them. WIth a peaceful discord server made to open discussions it shuts down within 48 hours, why? Let's find out! Thanks for watching!
Like, Comment and Subscribe for more videos!
title: Huge Disaster On Discord...
